verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maa devudavai maa kitchitivi entho goppa Shubha dinamu (2) memandaramu utsahinchi Santoshinchedamu (2) koni yaadedamu Maruvabadani melula jesenani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee okkadave goppa devudavu ghana Kaaryamulu cheyuduvu needu krupaye Nirantharamu nilichi yundunugaa ninnu memu Aanandamutho aaraadinchedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nootanamuga dina dinamu niluchu needu Vaatsalyatha maapai khyathi gaa niliche Nee naamamunu keertincheda meppudu preetitho Maa stutularpnchedamu daakshinya phrabhuvaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neeve maaku parama prabhudavai nee Chittamu neraverchitivi jeevamu nitchi Nadipinchitivi nee aatma dwaaraa nadipinchedavu Samabhoomi gala pradeshamulo nannu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhariyinchitivi shramalu nindalu orchitivanni Maa koraku maranamu gelchi odinchitivi Saataanu balamun paramu nundi maakai vache Prabhu Yesu jayamu{/lang-eng}
